get.description:
Changelog

February 21, 2017:

  • Added Endpoint.

parameters.description:
When specified, this indicates the index of the item to start at.

When omitted, 0 is assumed.

When the value contains a non-digit or is not a multiple of 100, HTTP 400 ("Bad Request") is returned.
parameters.name: startAt

parameters.description: The desired language for the Metadata.
parameters.name: Accept-Language

200.description: The response body will contain the requested Metadata.
